description: George Santiago, Carson Morris and Kathy Scott were charged with conspiracy and fraud in connection with the beating of Kevin Moore on Nov. 12, 2013, at Downstate Correctional Facility in Fishkill, N.Y.
title: Charges Against 3 Corrections Officers in Fishkill, N.Y.
title_page: Charges Against 3 Corrections Officers in Fishkill, N.Y. - The New York Times
maintext:
Five New York Prison Guards Charged in â€™13 Beating of Inmate
The corrections officers, who worked in Fishkill, were accused of severely injuring Kevin Moore, tearing out his dreadlocks and lying about the encounter.
